rukus.text: Ine ndili kulumbira pali Mzinda uwu
Ndipo iwe uli ndi ufulu mu Mzinda uwu
Ndi pali wobereka ndi chimene adabereka
Ndithudi Ife tidamulenga munthu m’mavuto
Kodi amaganiza kuti palibe wina aliyense amene ali ndi mphamvu pa iye
Iye amanena monyada kuti: “Ine Al-Shams	653 ndaononga chuma chambiri.”
Kodi iye amaganiza kuti palibe wina amene ali kumuona
Kodi Ife sitidamupatse maso awiri
Ndi lirime ndi milomo iwiri
Ndi kumulangiza iye njira ziwiri
Koma sayerekeza kutsata njira yozyolika
Kodi chidzakuuza ndi chiani za njira yozyolika
Ndi kumasula kapolo
Kapena kupereka chakudya nthawi ya njala
Kwa wamasiye amene ndi wachinansi
Kapena munthu wosauka, wofuna chithandizo
Ndipo iye anakhala mmodzi wa anthu amene akhulupirira, ndipo analangizana wina ndi mzake kupilira, kumva chisoni ndi kuonetsa chifundo
Iwo ndiwo amene adzakhala kudzanja lamanja
Koma iwo amene anakana chivumbulutso chathu, adzaima ku dzanja lamanzere
Ndipo moto wa ku Gahena udzawakuta iwo
